title: My Morning Coffee
summary: A small-batch, medium-roast coffee blend that keeps me going — bright, balanced, and comforting every morning.
description: This is my everyday coffee. A carefully curated small-batch Arabian blend that strikes a warm balance of deep, earthy notes, toasted nuts, and a gentle citrus brightness. Perfect as a daily cup — bold enough to kick-start your focus, gentle enough for a slow sip.

title: Mechanical Keyboard
summary: A premium mechanical keyboard for better typing experience.
description: I'm looking to upgrade my keyboard to a high-quality mechanical one with tactile switches for better feedback and comfort during long coding sessions.

title: 4K Monitor
summary: A high-resolution 4K monitor for better productivity.
description: I need a larger, higher resolution monitor to improve my workflow and make coding and design work more efficient.

title: Ergonomic Mouse
summary: An ergonomic wireless mouse for comfortable computing.
description: A comfortable, wireless ergonomic mouse to reduce strain during long hours of work.

title: Office Chair
summary: A comfortable office chair for better posture and health.
description: An ergonomic office chair to support proper posture during long coding sessions and improve overall comfort.
